description: Verification rules for ui story validator

validationStatus.errorMessage: validationStatus must be one of: needs-improvement, acceptable, excellent

estimatedComplexity.errorMessage: estimatedComplexity must be one of: low, medium, high

consistencyRules.description: Score should align with validation status
consistencyRules.check: if validationStatus is 'excellent', score should be >= 90; if 'acceptable', 70-89; if 'needs-improvement', < 70

consistencyRules.description: readyForImplementation should be false if validationStatus is 'needs-improvement'
consistencyRules.check: if validationStatus is 'needs-improvement', readyForImplementation must be false

consistencyRules.description: Critical issues should result in needs-improvement status
consistencyRules.check: if any issue has severity 'critical', validationStatus should be 'needs-improvement'
